ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] How much will you pay to play?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just payed $850 to upgrade my computer to be able to play EQ and hopefully every other game that is released in the next 2-3 years. ... From: mlockridge01
ygData.messageBody:
I just payed $850 to upgrade my computer to be able to play EQ and hopefully every other game that is released in the next 2-3 years.
----- Original Message -----
From: mlockridge01
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 30, 2002 5:56 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] How much will you pay to play?

My previous post touched on this. I have thought about it a bit. We
pay less than $200 a year just to play. Not bad. I spent at least
$500 on GamesWorkshop products each year when I was more active
there.

I don't have a problem dropping the monthly fee. It is quite
reasonable. I might be able to dump another $500 a year into
upgrades. Unfortunately, my machine is now pretty much maxed. So I
must hope that I can hold out at the present level long enough to get
together the funds for a more upgradeable tower.

How much are others willing to pay to play?

Barto Proudfoot



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com


Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
